Package com.example.marill_many_events.models

Class PhotoPicker

java.lang.Object
com.example.marill_many_events.models.PhotoPicker
public class PhotoPicker extends Object
PhotoPicker is a utility class that allows users to select or delete profile pictures through an interface provided within an Android Fragment.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    PhotoPicker.OnPhotoSelectedListener
    Interface for handling photo selection and deletion events.

    Opens the photo picker to select a profile picture.

    Displays a bottom sheet dialog with options to either replace or delete a profile picture.

  • Constructor Details

    • PhotoPicker

      public PhotoPicker(androidx.fragment.app.Fragment fragment, PhotoPicker.OnPhotoSelectedListener listener)
      Constructs a PhotoPicker instance.
      Parameters:
      fragment - The fragment that will host the photo picker.
      listener - The listener to handle photo selection and deletion events.

  • Method Details

    • openPhotoPicker

      public void openPhotoPicker()
      Opens the photo picker to select a profile picture.

    • showPhotoOptions

      public void showPhotoOptions(String profilePictureUrl)
      Displays a bottom sheet dialog with options to either replace or delete a profile picture.
      Parameters:
      profilePictureUrl - The URL of the current profile picture, used to determine if the delete option should be shown.
